ygData.subject: Re: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You ll have to use invis, really.  The orcs from Crushbone are working on an alliance with teh Dark Elves, which is why the CB orcs don t attack you with
ygData.messageBody:
> From: tri-mix@... (Ronnie G. Free II)
>
> Rival,
> I am sorry to hear that you ran into trouble.. But I must admit that I have
> never found an Orc that can see invisible ( I may be wrong, its just that I
> have never ran into one). What server are you on? I am on the Rathe Server
> and would be happy to assist you in obtaining your Animation. Here is
> another Thought for you also: You may want to use the Dark Elf illusion,
> the Orcs in CrushBone do not attack me when I am using the DE illusion so
> perhaps the Orcs in Highpass will not either.. But I would still use
> INVIS..

You'll have to use invis, really. The orcs from Crushbone are working
on an alliance with teh Dark Elves, which is why the CB orcs don't
attack you with the DE Illusion up. Other orcs have no qualms about
eating Dark Elves for breakfast.

E
--
"Maybe I was mean
but I really don't think so
You asked if I'm scared and I
said so"

-Sinead O'Connor, "The Emperor's New Clothes"
